name: Pylo's Peril
description:
Poor Pylo falls down a hole and must get back home. 

Using the arrow keys to walk will get you some where, but nowhere fast. 

Hold the down button to charge up till you hear the ping or see Pylo flashing:

  • Just letting go gives you a super high jump
  • Left / Right and you will zoom off in that direction 

Collect balloons and find your way out.

Use B & M buttons to toggle the background / music of the game. 

If you get really really stuck then use the ESC key to restart the level

------------------------------------

  • Art is by  GrafxKid and the packs used are in my GDevelop Game Jam #2 collection
  • Sounds are from Kenny Assets & Diablo Luna
  • Music is from Streambeats the Pastel Album
  • Voices by Cici Fyre

------------------------------------

*It could do with some more polish, but it would be great to get your feedback :) Hope you enjoy Pylo's Peril 

*Feel free to leave your scores in the comments and thank you for taking the time to play Pylo's Peril
